data.title: How Many Movies of Shahrukh Khan are Superhit and Flop.pdf
data.meta_description: How Many Movies of Shahrukh Khan are Superhit and Flop.pdf - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. How Many Movies of Shahrukh Khan are Superhit and Flop January 24, 2023 By Yelloscreen Desk 1992 to 2022:The total number of films Shah Rukh Khan has appeared in 30 years ago Shahrukh Khan entered the film industry with the goal of being successful in Bollywood, bringing with him charm, good looks, and flawless acting abilities. With followers all around the world, that star is currently not only ruling B-Town and India but has figuratively transformed into the “King of the World.” Starting his career as a villain to becoming the undisputed king of romance, Shah Rukh Khan has come a long way and enjoys massive stardom. Here is a list of all the Hindi films starring Shahrukh Khan that have been released in India between 1992 and 2023, along with the box office results for each film, including whether it was a hit, blockbuster, average, or flop. Best pairing of Shahrukh Khan is with Kajol and Juhi Chawla.
